card_arrival: Your card is on the way. Delivery usually takes between 7–10 business days depending on your region.
card_linking: To link your card, go to your card settings in the app and follow the linking instructions.

supported_cards_and_currencies: You can view all supported cards and currencies in the app under Account Settings.

why_verify_identity: Identity verification helps keep your account secure and is required by financial regulations.

visa_or_mastercard: Your card type depends on your region. You can check the card details in your app.
topping_up_by_card: You can top up instantly using a debit or credit card. Go to the Top-Up section.

compromised_card: If you believe your card is compromised, freeze it immediately and request a replacement.
atm_support: You can withdraw money from any ATM that accepts your card network (Visa/Mastercard).
direct_debit_payment_not_recognised: If a direct debit looks unfamiliar, check with the merchant or raise a dispute.
passcode_forgotten: You can reset your passcode using the 'Forgot Passcode' option on the login screen.
declined_cash_withdrawal: Withdrawals may be declined due to insufficient funds or ATM restrictions.
pending_card_payment: Pending card payments usually settle within a few days. The final amount may change.
lost_or_stolen_phone: Please log in from another device and secure your account immediately.
request_refund: Refunds must be processed by the merchant. Once issued, they may take days to appear.
declined_transfer: Transfers may be declined due to insufficient balance or security reasons.
Refund_not_showing_up: Refunds may take several days depending on the merchant and card processor.
declined_card_payment: Payments may be declined due to security filters or insufficient funds.
pending_transfer: Transfers may stay pending while being processed by the recipient's bank.
terminate_account: We're sorry to see you go. You can request account termination in the app settings.
card_swallowed: If an ATM keeps your card, please report it immediately to request a replacement.
transaction_charged_twice: This may be a temporary hold. If both charges settle, contact support.
verify_source_of_funds: We may need additional documents to verify the source of your funds as required by regulations.
transfer_timing: Transfer timing varies by currency and bank. Most transfers are completed within minutes to hours.
reverted_card_payment?: If a payment is reverted, the funds will return automatically within a few days.
change_pin: You can change your card PIN in the app under card security settings.
beneficiary_not_allowed: The recipient’s bank may not allow certain transfers. Please check the beneficiary details.
transfer_fee_charged: Some transfers may include fees depending on currency or region.
receiving_money: You can receive money instantly through your account details or payment links.
failed_transfer: Transfers may fail due to incorrect details or insufficient balance.
transfer_into_account: You can transfer funds into your account using bank transfer or card top-up.

cash_withdrawal_charge: Some ATMs may apply withdrawal fees. These are controlled by the ATM operator.

apple_pay_or_google_pay: You can add your card to Apple Pay or Google Pay directly from your wallet app.
